snippet.title: Down the Rabbit Hole - Gameplay Trailer | PSVR, Oculus Quest & Rift, Steam VR
snippet.description:
Down the Rabbit Hole is a unique VR adventure that serves as a prequel story to Lewis Carroll’s classic Alice in Wonderland tale. Players will assume the role of a girl who has accidentally wandered into Wonderland and control her fate by plotting her journey through an immersive, 3D diorama world that wraps around them.

The game is built on a unique VR locomotion system and is alternately experienced both from a 1p and 3p perspective. Through the game’s many twists and turns, players will find themselves exploring the strangest corners of Wonderland, solving puzzles, uncovering secrets and making choices about the story along the way.

Is there truth to the Cheshire Cat’s declaration “most everyone’s mad here”? You will soon find out. Down the Rabbit Hole will be released on March 26th, 2020.

Down the Rabbit Hole:
Website: https://www.downtherabbitholegame.com

Cortopia Studios:
Website: https://www.cortopia.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/cortopiastudios
Twitter: https://twitter.com/cortopiastudios
